subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Japan ex-PM Miyazawa dies at 87

06/28/07 04:33 AM, EDT
Former Prime Minister Kiichi Miyazawa, whose career stretched from Japan's defeat in World War Two through the 1990s "lost decade" of economic stagnation, died on Thursday at the age of 87, his office said.
FULL STORY
